amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to eliminate funding for International Disaster Assistance.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the International Disaster Assistance account by $3,905,460,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 86 - 346 (Roll no. 467).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 86 - 346 (Roll no. 467).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
